tender.title: Repair and raising of existingdamaged RandomRubble Masonry roadside drain cum footpath at Km.324 and Km.325 (at Jakhalabandha Town), providing hardshoulder with ICBP at Km.337, 338 and 339 including wire-rope crash barrier at stretches of Burapahar A
